decision_conditions: By reason of the installation of metal bars of different design over the window on the front elevation, the proposal cannot be accepted as a non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 204111FUL dated 23/12/2020, in accordance with Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990) and the Ealing Protocol for Non-Material Amendments following Grant of Planning Permission (2011).
site_name: R/o 51 Regina Road And Adj To
description: Retrospective application for a Non-Material Amendment (S96a) to planning permission ref: 204111FUL dated 23/12/2020 for: Conversion of attached single-storey garages into a dwellinghouse (Use Class C3); associated cycle parking and waste storage space; first floor front extension; and alterations to front elevation involving replacement of garage doors with window opening and metal railing/gate, and to roof involving partial removal, raising and installation of six rooflights. Amendment seeks changes to the approved gate and window railings at the front, and removal of the original lintel over garage gate
